publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2125 Ms Margaret Curran on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Designation of Lead Committeeâ€”That the Parliament agrees that the Justice 1 Committee be designated as lead committee in consideration of the draft Criminal Procedure (Amendment) (Scotland) Act 2004 (Incidental, Supplemental and Consequential Provisions) Order 2005. Supported by: Tavish Scott*
